name: SokaSoka
description:
Taking inspiration from Sokaban, players can expect 10 Levels of Sokaban-like puzzles in SokaSoka. Watch out though because unlike pushing boxes to a plain old spot on the ground, you're pushing the box over ghosts. And these ghosts are sneaky. 

This game was made in 30 calendar days (3 dev days) and is the second game I've ever made, so there may be some bugs. There are probably also improvements I can make in the future.
